titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Carlisle Davidson papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Resident of Detroit, Michigan, Warden of the Vestry of St. Peter's Church in Detroit.
archdesc.scopecontent: Correspondence and miscellanea relating to the Episcopal Peace Fellowship and other religious social action groups in Detroit; papers relating to the Detroit Round Table of Catholics, Jews and Protestants in the 1940s. Also handwritten copies and transcripts of Davidson's 2011 reminiscences of Mar Thoma Syrian Church of Malabar India of Detroit (in Warren, Mich.) and its partnership with St. Peter Episcopal Church of Detroit, 1978-1998, and of St. Thomas Malankara Church in Detroit.
